jdbc-user-service.users-by-username-query: SELECT login, senha, 'true' as enable FROM USUARIO WHERE login=?
jdbc-user-service.authorities-by-username-query: select distinct * from ( (select u.login, gpp.permissao_id from USUARIO u join USUARIO_GRUPO_PERMISSAO usp on (u.id = usp.usuario_id) join GRUPO_PERMISSAO_PERMISSAO gpp on (gpp.permissao_grupo_id = usp.gruposPermissoes_ID) where u.conta_ativa = 1 ) union all (select u.login, up.permissao_id from USUARIO_PERMISSAO up join USUARIO u on up.usuario_id = u.id where u.conta_ativa = 1 ) ) uni where uni.login=?
